title: Hey look, another useless service from the player support team
body:
A while back I pinged player support for incorrectly removing a post I made on the NA boards for harassing a player, they identified this likely because it was titled Skrublord...

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/qb5WT5Nj-skrublord

_In case the link is broken I have two images here_

http://imgur.com/a/j3Cle

It was titled Skrublord because that is the culture in my elo and possibly a large part higher elo too, which framed the rest of the post as targeting that culture (while addressing no specific player whatsoever)

Yet when player support got back to me after about a week this was their response
http://imgur.com/tbYgsGZ

I was pretty pissed off that he took so long to offer so little, only to say the same stuff the boards "moderators" said... I have had a pretty bad time on league and wanted to discuss it with level headed peers but someone prevented that, then Keyru denies me closure.

And now I am here so fuck you both
